Sample.Title: Windows Azure Toolkit for Social Games
Sample.Description: Building a social game is a tough challenge. From the first iteration developers must plan for and deal with issues like high concurrency, real time interaction, and rapid growth. The Windows Azure Toolkit for Social Games provides you with the tools you need to ramp up your game development quickly on an architecture that will help you face future challenges. The toolkit leverages the power of Windows Azure and game development best practices to handle even the most demanding social games.
